string_data: check failed - There is a factual inconsistency regarding the location targeted. The article states that Shut the System claimed to target "the Northampton HQ of Barclaycard" in the text, but the image caption refers to "Shut the System activists claimed to be at the Barclays HQ in Northampton." Barclaycard and Barclays are different entities, and this inconsistency creates confusion about which company was actually targeted, undermining the article's credibility.
